alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 11 at 7:46PM PST until January 12 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Interior portions of the Bay Area and Central Coast. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Far interior portions of the East Bay and southern portions of Monterey and San Benito Counties could see low temperatures dip into the upper 20s.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
